scripts.start: npm run build && npm run build:react && electron .
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run build:react && electron-packager . --ignore='frontend/package.json' --ignore='/frontend/node_modules' --ignore='/frontend/src' --overwrite --asar --out=release --prune=true --icon=assets/appicon
scripts.release:cross: npm run build && npm run build:react && electron-packager . --ignore='/frontend/package.json' --ignore='/frontend/node_modules' --ignore='/frontend/src' --overwrite --asar --out=release --platform=darwin,win32 --prune=true --icon=assets/appicon --app-bundle-id='com.redhat.codeready.containers'
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run watch" "electron ." "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.release:mac-universal: npm run build && npm run build:react && electron-packager . --ignore='/frontend/package.json' --ignore='/frontend/node_modules' --ignore='/frontend/src' --overwrite --asar --out=release --platform=darwin --arch=universal --prune=true --icon=assets/appicon --app-bundle-id='com.redhat.codeready.containers'
